channel.title: Neural-Net on bigelectrons
channel.description: Recent content in Neural-Net on bigelectrons

item.title: Understanding Feed Forward Neural Network Architectures
item.description: I have been reading through the architectures of Neural Networks and wanted to grasp the idea behind calculating the weights in a Neural Network and as you can see in the image below is a simple 2 node 2 layer Neural Network. As you can see that for simplicity’s sake, I have just used a 2 node 2 layer network, but the same holds true for any sized Neural Network. It's just that the size of the Matrix increases proportionally to the number of inputs!
